Html:
Hey,

sorry for the stupid question. I`m new here, I`ve never worked with GMap.

I created a Map with ArcMap and I have to import it to GMap because of an company. 

Is it possible to make this without any programing knowledge? If yes, how?

 

Or can me maybe write a short tutorial how it works?

Please help me, it`s very important!

 

Thank You!
open it. how can I visualize my ArcMap in GMap?
It`s an ArcGIS (ESRI) program. So now I have an ArcGIS Map, and I would like to have it in GMap.NET.WindowsForms

how can I make this? please write a short tutorial.

I`m really thankfull for helping!
please help me radioman, it would be very important and you`re my last chance

Without (rather profound) programming knowledge it is not possible. Basically you need to extract the data from the ESRI shape-file, and then show it in GMap.

I did it, using shapelib (there is a .NET wrapper available - http://shapelib.maptools.org/ ) to read the data from the shapefile, then you can display it in layers as you need it.
Thank You Xandolph for your answer! Ok, I have to look for somebody, who has this knowledge.
